details.text: Building automation systems and SaaS for Wiwynn's Worldwide site data centers, reducing operational costs and achieving 99.5% SLA high availability

children: Designed and developed a cloud native based datacenter-grade test data management platform integrating Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL, Apache NiFi, and Azure cloud services, implementing end-to-end automated workflows from distributed storage monitoring, data compression and encryption, integrity validation to redundant backup. The system employs state machine tracking for data lifecycle management, with idempotent retry mechanisms and soft-delete buffering to ensure data consistency and automatic recovery under failure scenarios such as power outages and network disruptions. Achieved high availability architecture and disaster recovery capabilities through proactive health monitoring, multi-region replication, and automated failover mechanisms, ensuring data durability and rapid retrieval of critical test assets.

Designed Azure Blob Storage integration tool optimizing file transfer performance and cost balance across international data centers — established standardized workflows and conducted team onboarding training.
Led migration from self-hosted registry to Azure Container Registry — eliminated single point of failure, improved global deployment speed, managed migration strategy and technical documentation.

Configured Azure Front Door to serve self-maintained packages from Azure Blob Storage with automated collection tooling to overcome apt package management constraints — reduced K8s cluster provisioning time by several hours leveraging Azure's regional CDN performance.
* Designed flexible Azure DevOps pipeline framework supporting multi-site customization requirements and accelerating CI/CD workflows.

Collaborated cross-team to diagnose API performance bottlenecks using database profiling tools — redesigned index architecture and optimized query logic, achieving 99% improvement in API response time.

Implemented Kafka as asynchronous communication layer between internal systems and third-party services with custom-developed connectors — decoupled system dependencies and improved fault tolerance, ensuring core business continuity during third-party service outages.

Led team to develop abstraction layer for multi-vendor switch commands with unified interface for heterogeneous network equipment operations — trained on-site personnel for basic troubleshooting capabilities, reducing incident recovery time and improving system availability.

Engineered automated testing solutions for immersion cooling infrastructure — served as technical liaison between internal teams and external vendors, designed API specifications for system integration, and delivered multi-system coordination framework.

details.text: Prototyped Omniverse-based digital twin for production line monitoring — delivered real-time 3D visualization production line and SaaS tool for pre-production simulation.
children: Developed real-time synchronization system between physical robotic arms and digital twin using Isaac Sim with customized Nvidia extensions, Connect SDK, and web viewer — optimized data sync frequency and arm parameters for smooth operation visualization.

Led team to build Omniverse-based production line simulation web tool enabling cycle time analysis and collision detection through configurable robotic arm actions and conveyor speeds — validated production scenarios prior to physical deployment.

details.text: Developed image recognition system for automated end-to-end testing
children: Developed image recognition system for automated end-to-end testing simulating user behavior — established data collection and annotation system with standardized workflow to ensure training data quality, trained YOLO model using PyTorch for UI component detection and classification, deployed via Flask API achieving 95% accuracy across multi-platform UI elements.

Developed chiller power optimization system — analyzed motor load patterns during cooling cycles, optimized motor frequency control strategy through machine learning to reduce energy consumption costs.
Managed Linux server infrastructure and PostgreSQL/MySQL databases ensuring stable operation of ML SaaS platform.

details.text: Established a DevOps and agile development culture
children: Led agile transformation initiative implementing Kanban workflow and GitLab CI/CD pipelines to improve team development efficiency.
Conducted hands-on Git workflow training.

zh.name: 李政勳
summary: 以解決方案為導向的工程師，擅長在技術實作與商業需求之間搭起橋樑。
具備從需求蒐集到正式上線的專案領導實績，成功交付自動化系統與 SaaS 平台，有效降低營運成本。熟悉 Python／K8s／Azure，在系統架構設計與跨團隊協作方面具備強大能力。
擅長快速原型開發與解決方案驗證，並具備實務層面的 AI 理解，能加速開發流程並創造實際的商業價值。

details.text: 建置自動化系統與 SaaS 平台，服務緯穎全球資料中心，降低營運成本並達成 99.5% SLA 高可用性

children.text: 資料中心日誌歸檔系統
children: 設計並開發基於雲原生架構的資料中心級測試數據管理平台，整合 Django REST Framework、PostgreSQL、Apache NiFi 及 Azure 雲端服務，實現從分散式儲存監控、數據壓縮加密、完整性驗證到冗餘備份的端到端自動化工作流程。系統採用狀態機追蹤數據生命週期管理，透過冪等重試機制與軟刪除緩衝確保數據一致性，並在斷電、網路中斷等故障情境下自動恢復。透過主動健康監控、多區域複製及自動故障轉移機制，實現高可用性架構與災難復原能力，確保數據持久性與關鍵測試資產的快速檢索。
設計 Azure Blob Storage 整合工具，優化跨國資料中心間的檔案傳輸效能與成本平衡，建立標準化作業流程並完成團隊導入訓練。
主導從 self-hosted registry 遷移至 Azure Container Registry — 消除單點故障風險，提升全球部署速度，負責遷移策略規劃與技術文件製作。
配置 Azure Front Door 從 Azure Blob Storage 提供自維護套件，搭配自動化收集工具解決 apt 套件管理限制 — 利用 Azure 區域 CDN 將 K8s cluster 建置時間縮短數小時。
設計彈性化 Azure DevOps pipeline 框架，支援多工廠客製化需求，加速 CI/CD 流程。
協助跨團隊診斷 API 效能瓶頸，透過資料庫分析工具定位問題，重新設計索引結構並優化查詢邏輯 — 將 API 響應速度提升 99%。
建立 Kafka 作為內部系統與第三方服務間的非同步通訊層，自行開發內部 connector — 解耦系統依賴、提升容錯能力，確保第三方服務異常時不影響核心業務流程。
領導團隊開發多廠牌 switch 指令抽象層，提供統一介面操作異構網路設備，並建立現場人員培訓計畫 — 使現場團隊具備基礎故障排除能力，縮短故障恢復時間並提升系統可用性。
開發浸沒式冷卻基礎設施自動化測試方案 — 擔任內部團隊與外部廠商間的技術溝通橋樑，設計系統整合 API 規範，交付多系統協調框架。

details.text: 原型開發 Omniverse 數位孿生產線監控及模擬系統
children: 使用 Isaac Sim 結合客製化 Nvidia extension、Connect SDK 及 web viewer 開發實體機械手臂與數位孿生間的即時同步系統 — 優化資料同步頻率與手臂參數，實現流暢的運作視覺化。
領導團隊開發基於 Omniverse 的生產線模擬工具，透過可配置的機械手臂動作與輸送帶轉速進行 cycle time 分析與碰撞偵測 — 於實體部署前驗證生產情境。

details.text: 用於端到端測試的影像辨識系統
children: 開發影像辨識系統用於自動化端到端測試，模擬使用者行為，建立資料搜集與標注系統，制定標注流程規範確保訓練資料品質，使用 PyTorch 訓練 YOLO 模型進行 UI 元件偵測與分類，透過 Flask API 提供服務達成 97% 準確率，可識別跨平台 UI 元件

details.text: 冰水主機用電最佳化系統
children: 開發冰水主機用電最佳化系統 — 分析冷卻過程中的馬達負載模式，透過機器學習技術優化馬達頻率控制策略，降低能耗成本，開發web 介面供多廠區部署使用
負責 Linux 伺服器架設與維運、PostgreSQL/MySQL 資料庫管理，確保 ML SaaS 平台穩定運作

details.text: 建立 DevOps 與敏捷開發文化
children: 主導敏捷開發文化導入，建立看板系統與 GitLab CI/CD 流程，提升團隊開發效率
舉辦 Git 工作流程實務訓練
